thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 4 of 175
thread.title: Sheryl Raumann

author: Sheryl Raumann
title: Sheryl Raumann
text: I have joined a couple of house sitting sites but TrustedHousesitters blows all the others away. The offers are posted twice daily for positions all over the world. Customer Service is quick and reliable. The company's site offers everything needed to get started as a house sitter or as someone looking for a sitter. I value my house and pets. I have used this site to find a trusted house sitter and it works like a charm.
